summary.span: 表示将处理 、 和 上的 、 和相关事件的方法。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 你必须等待，直到 HTML 文档已完成加载以便将事件处理程序附加到文档。You must wait until an HTML document has finished loading in order to attach an event handler to the document. 如果你尝试加载已完成之前附加处理程序，则附加操作可能失败。If you attempt to attach a handler before loading has completed, the attach operation may fail. 若要附加新的文档中的事件处理程序的最佳位置是在事件处理程序控件。The best place to attach event handlers in a new document is in the event handler for the control. ## Examples 下面的代码将事件处理程序附加， ，和上的事件。The following code attaches event handlers for the , , and events on . 此代码示例假定你的项目包含的一个实例控件名为`WebBrowser1`。This code sample assumes your project has an instance of the control named `WebBrowser1`. [!code-cpp[HtmlElementEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/HtmlElementEventHandler/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HtmlElementEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/HtmlElementEventHandler/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HtmlElementEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/HtmlElementEventHandler/VB/form1.vb#1)]
